snippet.title: The World’s Egg – For Those Who Dream - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
While enjoying an ordinary day in town, Mari suddenly finds herself surrounded by people collapsing and some transforming into monsters. Guided by a mysterious voice, she is given the ability to fight back against the evil creatures.

The World’s Egg – For Those Who Dream on Kagura Games Store: https://www.kaguragames.com/product/the-worlds-egg-for-those-who-dream/

The World’s Egg – For Those Who Dream on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2614670/The_Worlds_Egg__For_Those_Who_Dream/
